name: mean-course
description: MEAN refers to first letters of the four components of a free and open-source solution stack for building dynamic web sites. MEAN is a full-stack JavaScript platform designed for web applications. Valeri Karpov was a MongoDB developer at that time, who coined the MEAN stack term, and tells about it in one of his blog posts. The components of the MEAN stack are as follows:
author: Miguel Angel Martin Hernandez <mookiefumi@outlook.com> (http://www.mookiefumi.com)
